title: Crusader states and Fatimids and commerce

content.question: Commerce was a key mode of exchange between which of the following pairs of political entities?

choices.label: The Mayan Empire and the Song dynasty
The Crusader states and the Fatimid caliphate

content.answer: The Crusader states and the Fatimid caliphate

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
